Package controller

Class LoginWindow

java.lang.Object
controller.LoginWindow
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class LoginWindow extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
LoginWindow Controller for controlling the login window and authorizing user input.

  • Constructor Details

      public LoginWindow()

  • Method Details

    • loginMethod

      private void loginMethod() throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Handles the login process. Retrieves login information from input fields, sanitizes the input, and performs the necessary actions for login. If either the username or password is empty, the login attempt is abandoned, and an appropriate message is logged.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
      InterruptedException - If the thread is interrupted.

    • logLoginAttempt

      private void logLoginAttempt(String username, boolean loginSuccess)
      Logs a login attempt, including the username, date-time information (both UTC and user's time zone), and whether the login was successful or not. The log entry is appended to the "login_activity.txt" file.
      Parameters:
      username - The username associated with the login attempt.
      loginSuccess - A boolean indicating whether the login attempt was successful (true) or not (false).

    • loginClick

      public void loginClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Handles the action when the login button is clicked. Invokes the loginMethod to process the login attempt.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The action event triggered by clicking the login button.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O exception occurs while processing the login.
      InterruptedException - If the login process is interrupted.

    • loginEnter

      public void loginEnter(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent keyEvent) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Handles the action when the Enter key is pressed. Initiates the login process by calling loginMethod.
      Parameters:
      keyEvent - The key event triggered by pressing the Enter key.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O exception occurs while processing the login.
      InterruptedException - If the login process is interrupted.

    • handleDarkButtonClick

      public void handleDarkButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Handles the action when the dark mode button is clicked. Toggles the dark mode setting, updates the button text, and reloads the login scene.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The action event triggered by clicking the dark mode button.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O exception occurs while reloading the login scene.

    • changeLangComboSelect

      public void changeLangComboSelect(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles the action when a language is selected from the language combo box. Updates the current language setting and reloads the login scene.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The action event triggered by selecting a language from the combo box.

    • exitClick

      public void exitClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles the action when the exit button is clicked. Exits the application.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The action event triggered by clicking the exit button.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the login scene with default values. Sets the resource bundle, loads the location field, sets the login language, updates the dark mode button text, and pre-fills the username and password inputs if in developer mode. Also resets the login keeper.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The URL to initialize the controller. Unused in this context.
      resourceBundle - The resource bundle containing localized strings.

    • loadLocationField

      public void loadLocationField()
      Loads the location field with information about the user's current locale and time zone.

    • loadLanguagesComboBox

      public void loadLanguagesComboBox()
      Loads available languages into the language combo box.

    • setCurrentLangAndReload

      public void setCurrentLangAndReload(javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<String> langSelector)
      Sets the current language based on the selected value in the language selector combo box and reloads the login scene with the updated language.
      Parameters:
      langSelector - The combo box containing language options.

    • setLoginLang

      public void setLoginLang(ResourceBundle resourceBundle, URL url)
      Sets the login scene language based on the provided in the current messages bundle. t updates labels, buttons, and other UI elements with the corresponding strings.
      Parameters:
      resourceBundle - The ResourceBundle containing language strings.
      url - The URL representing the location of the messages bundle.
